org.jvnet.substance.skin
Class SubstanceOfficeSilver2007LookAndFeel

java.lang.Object
  javax.swing.LookAndFeel
      javax.swing.plaf.basic.BasicLookAndFeel
          org.jvnet.substance.SubstanceLookAndFeel
              org.jvnet.substance.skin.SubstanceOfficeSilver2007LookAndFeel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class SubstanceOfficeSilver2007LookAndFeel
extends SubstanceLookAndFeel

Standalone look-and-feel that uses the Office Silver 2007 skin from OfficeSilver2007Skin. You can set this look-and-feel by:

  • -Dswing.defaultlaf=org.jvnet.substance.skin. SubstanceOfficeSilver2007LookAndFeel
  • UIManager.setLookAndFeel( "org.jvnet.substance.skin.SubstanceOfficeSilver2007LookAndFeel" );
  • UIManager.setLookAndFeel(new SubstanceOfficeSilver2007LookAndFeel());

Since:
version 3.1
Author:
Kirill Grouchnikov
See Also:
Serialized Form
